Package sophiabcrypt

Class SbcEncEngine

java.lang.Object
sophiabcrypt.SbcEncEngine
public class SbcEncEngine
extends java.lang.Object
This a main engine class of SophiaBCrypt. It's used for start process encrypt and decrypt files
Since:
Oct/2018
Author:
CesarBianchi
See Also:
SbcEncryptor

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String[] getFiles()
    This method returns the private aFiles array attibute of this class with all files for processing
    java.lang.String getOper()
    This method return the private cOper attibute of this class (ENC or DEC)
    int getQtdFiles()
    This method returns the private nQtdFiles attibute of this class with quantity of files for processing
    void GoCrypt​(java.lang.String cPsw, java.lang.String cPath)
    Read a binary file, create a new encrypt filename, call encrypt class, save new file and erase a primal file
    void GoCryptM​(java.lang.String cPsw)
    Load all full path files for crpyt and call Encrypt method
    void GoDecrypt​(java.lang.String cPsw, java.lang.String cPath)
    Read a encrypted file, create a new decrypt filename, call decrypt class, save new file and erase a encrypted file
    void GoDecryptM​(java.lang.String cPsw)
    Load all full path files for decrpyt and call DeCrypt method

    This method set the private aFiles array attibute of this class with all files for processing

    This method set the private cOper attibute of this class (ENC or DEC)

    This method set the private nQtdFiles attibute of this class with quantity of files for processing
    void setSbcExtension​(java.lang.String cType)
    This method set the private cSbcExtension attibute of this class with three letters about file type of encrypted files

      public void GoCryptM​(java.lang.String cPsw) throws java.lang.Exception
      Load all full path files for crpyt and call Encrypt method
      Parameters:
      cPsw - user defined password for encrypt file
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - Cause List of Files is null or zero

    • GoCrypt

      public void GoCrypt​(java.lang.String cPsw, java.lang.String cPath) throws java.lang.Exception
      Read a binary file, create a new encrypt filename, call encrypt class, save new file and erase a primal file
      Parameters:
      cPsw - user defined password for encrypt file
      cPath - full path of primal file
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - Cause file read or file create be error
      Since:
      Sep/2018

    • GoDecrypt

      public void GoDecrypt​(java.lang.String cPsw, java.lang.String cPath) throws java.lang.Exception
      Read a encrypted file, create a new decrypt filename, call decrypt class, save new file and erase a encrypted file
      Parameters:
      cPsw - user defined password for decrypt file
      cPath - full path of encrypted file
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - Cause file read or file create be error
      Since:
      Sep/2018

    • setOper

      public void setOper​(java.lang.String cOp)
      This method set the private cOper attibute of this class (ENC or DEC)
      Parameters:
      cOp - String of type operation. ENC equals "Encrypt" and DEC equals "Decrypt"
      Since:
      Sep/2018
